column1:
How do I delete my Classified Listing?|

To delete your Classified Listing, please follow the steps below:
1. Go to the Classified you want to delete.
2. Click on the delete link available at the bottom of your Classified Listing.
3. When prompted, click on &ldquo
column3:
to confirm the deletion of your Classified.

Note : Deletion of a Classified Listing is not a reversible process. It can not be recovered after being deleted.
